landing.cta.benefit1: Free for up to 3 team members
landing.cta.subtitle: Join 500+ teams already using Connectix. Get started in minutes.
landing.cta.title: Ready to secure your servers?
landing.detailedFeatures.access.title: Team Access Control
landing.detailedFeatures.audit.item1: Track every command and file change
landing.detailedFeatures.audit.title: Complete Audit Trail
landing.detailedFeatures.files.item1: Visual file browser with drag & drop
landing.detailedFeatures.files.title: Smart File Management
landing.detailedFeatures.terminal.title: Powerful Terminal
landing.detailedFeatures.title: Everything your team needs, in one place
landing.faq.api.answer: Yes! Our REST API lets you automate user provisioning, access management, and audit log exports.
landing.faq.api.question: Do you offer an API?
landing.faq.migration.answer: Our team provides white-glove migration support for all paid plans. We'll help you transition smoothly.
landing.faq.migration.question: What if I need help migrating?
landing.faq.os.answer: Connectix works in any modern browser. Your servers can run Linux, Unix, or any SSH-enabled system.
landing.faq.os.question: Which operating systems do you support?
landing.faq.pricing.answer: Start free with up to 3 team members. Scale as you grow with transparent per-user pricing. No hidden fees.
landing.faq.pricing.question: How does pricing work?
landing.faq.security.answer: We use end-to-end encryption, zero-knowledge architecture, and are SOC2 compliant. Your credentials never touch our servers in plain text.
landing.faq.security.question: How secure is Connectix?
landing.faq.selfHost.answer: Yes! Enterprise plans include self-hosting options for teams that need complete control over their infrastructure.
landing.faq.selfHost.question: Can I self-host Connectix?
landing.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
landing.features.project.description: Group servers by client, environment, or team. Switch contexts instantly.
landing.features.project.title: Project Organization
landing.features.team.description: Grant specific permissions by folder, server, or project. See who's doing what in real-time.
landing.features.team.title: Team Collaboration
landing.features.terminal.description: Full terminal access right in your browser. Run commands, edit files, manage services.
landing.features.terminal.title: Integrated Terminal

landing.useCases.startups.detail2: Revoke access instantly when team members leave

landing.useCases.startups.detail4: Keep infrastructure costs low with efficient resource sharing

about.cta.subtitle: Start managing your servers the modern way. Free for up to 3 team members.
about.cta.title: Ready to join 500+ teams already using Connectix?
about.hero.subtitle: The complete SSH management platform for modern development teams
about.hero.title: About
about.mission.description: Our mission is simple: make server management so secure and intuitive that teams can focus on what they do best - building great products. No more juggling tools, no more security nightmares, just seamless collaboration.
about.mission.point1: Replace multiple tools with one unified platform
about.mission.point2: Onboard developers in under 5 minutes, not hours
about.mission.point3: Provide enterprise-grade security for teams of all sizes
about.mission.title: Empowering 500+ Teams Worldwide
about.security.description: Managing 10,000+ servers across 500+ teams means security isn't optional - it's everything. That's why we've built Connectix with zero-trust architecture from day one.
about.security.feature1.description: Your credentials never touch our servers in plain text
about.security.feature1.title: Zero-Knowledge Architecture
about.security.feature2.description: Audited and certified for enterprise use
about.security.feature2.title: SOC2 Type II Compliant
about.security.feature3.description: Every command, file change, and access logged
about.security.feature3.title: Complete Audit Trail
about.security.feature4.description: SSO, 2FA, hardware keys, and biometric support
about.security.feature4.title: Advanced Authentication
about.security.title: Security is Our Foundation
about.stats.servers.label: Servers managed
about.stats.teams.label: Active teams
about.stats.uptime.label: Uptime SLA
about.story.different.description: Built by developers, for developers. We've experienced the pain firsthand - that's why Connectix focuses on what matters: security without sacrificing speed, collaboration without compromising control, and simplicity without limiting power.
about.story.different.title: Why We're Different
about.story.problem.description: Every team faces the same challenges: Terminal apps, SFTP clients, and password managers scattered across devices. SSH keys shared through Slack. No visibility into who accessed what. Hours spent onboarding new developers. We knew there had to be a better way.
about.story.problem.title: The Problem
about.story.solution.description: Connectix unifies terminal access, file management, and team collaboration in one secure, browser-based platform. With end-to-end encryption, granular permissions, and complete audit trails, we've reimagined how teams manage server access.
about.story.solution.title: Our Solution
about.team.description: From startups to enterprises, development teams to agencies - Connectix adapts to how you work, not the other way around. Real-time collaboration meets granular control.
about.team.feature1.description: Define permissions by folder, command, or time. Perfect for contractors and junior developers.
about.team.feature1.title: Role-Based Access Control
about.team.feature2.description: See who's accessing what in real-time. Get alerts for sensitive operations.
about.team.feature2.title: Real-Time Activity Monitoring
about.team.feature3.description: Separate clients, environments, and teams. Switch contexts instantly.
about.team.feature3.title: Project-Based Organization
about.team.feature4.description: Add team members and they're productive immediately. Revoke access just as fast.
about.team.feature4.title: 5-Minute Onboarding
about.team.title: Collaboration at Scale
about.values.experience.description: Built by developers who feel your pain. If it's not faster than your current workflow, we've failed.
about.values.experience.title: Developer Experience
about.values.security.description: Every feature, every line of code starts with security. Your infrastructure is too important for compromises.
about.values.security.title: Security First
about.values.title: Our Core Values
about.values.transparent.description: No hidden fees, no vendor lock-in. Export your data anytime. Self-host if you need to.
about.values.transparent.title: Transparent & Fair
